SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?author) AS ?count) { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship1 . ?authorship1 oa:hasAuthor ?author1 . FILTER(?author1 = ?author) } GROUP BY ?work }

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for papers published by Michael Vynnycky?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) WHERE { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship oa:hasAuthor ?author . ?author <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> "https://orcid.org/0000-0002-8318-1251" . ?authorship oa:hasNumberOfCreators ?count . }

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for research papers published by Ivica L.?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) { SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?author) AS ?count) WHERE { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship oa:hasAuthor ?author . ?author <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3560-4288" . } GROUP BY ?author }

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for papers published by P. R. S. Mendon\u00E7a?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) WHERE { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship oa:hasAuthor ?author . ?author <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-4025-4083" . ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship2 . ?authorship2 oa:hasAuthor ?author3 . ?author3 <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> ?y GROUP BY ?y }

natural_language_question: What is the average number of co-authors for research papers published by Gustaf S\u00F6derlind?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) WHERE { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship oa:hasAuthor ?author . ?author <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3559-960X" . ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship2 . ?authorship2 oa:hasAuthor ?author2 . FILTER(?author2 != ?author) ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship3 . ?authorship3 oa:hasAuthor ?author3 . ?author3 <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> ?y . FILTER(?y != "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3559-960X") ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship4 . ?authorship4 oa:hasAuthor ?author4 . ?author4 <https://dbpedia.org/ontology/orcidId> ?y . FILTER(?y != "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3559-960X") } GROUP BY ?y

natural_language_question: List the titles of the papers that Nikolay M. Safyannikov published and in which venues.
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX fabio: <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/> SELECT DISTINCT ?venue ?title WHERE { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship oa:hasAuthor ?author . ?author oa:orcidId "https://orcid.org/0000-0002-5424-0881" . ?work oa:hasLocation ?location . ?location oa:hasSource ?venue . ?work oa:hasTitle ?title . }

natural_language_question: Which papers did author Gerard J. M. Janssen publish and in which year?
sparql_query_kg2: PREFIX oa: <https://semopenalex.org/ontology/> PREFIX fabio: <http://purl.org/spar/fabio/> SELECT DISTINCT ?work ?year WHERE { ?work oa:hasAuthorship ?authorship . ?authorship oa:hasAuthor <https://dblp.org/pid/49/4927> . ?work fabio:hasPublicationYear ?year . }
